tuv.seg: Victims of Crime and the Garda Siochana
An Garda Síochána agus íospartaigh choireanna
The Gardai (Irish police force) work towards preventing crime, protecting life and property, preserving the peace and maintaining public safety
Tá na Gardaí ag obair le coireanna a stopadh, saol agus maoin a chosaint, síocháin a choinneáil agus sábháilteacht an phobail a chothú
When crimes and offences happen, the Gardai investigate them and try to bring those responsible to justice
Nuair a bhíonn coireanna ann, déanann na Gardaí iad a fhiosrú agus iarracht na daoine atá freagrach a thabhairt ós comhair na gcúirteanna
They do this by
Déanann siad a gcuid oibre
• cautioning young offenders for a range of minor offences,
• tríd foláireamh a thabhairt d'óigchiontóirí maidir le réimse mionchoireanna,
• prosecuting offenders in the District Court for less serious offences and
• tríd ciontóirí a thabhairt ós comhair na Cúirte Dúiche maidir le mionchoireanna agus
• reporting the results of investigations to the Director of Public Prosecutions and asking for direction for more serious crimes
• tuairisc a chur chuig Stiúrthóir na nInchúisithe Poiblí agus treoir a lorg uaidh/uaithi maidir le coireanna troma
The Gardai are committed to treating victims of crime with empathy, courtesy, respect and dignity
Tá na Gardaí dírithe ar thrua, cúirtéis, meas agus dínit a thaispeáint d'íobartaigh choireanna
If you are a victim of crime, the Gardai will respond quickly to your call
Má tá duine thíos le coir ní mór do na Gardaí teacht i gcabhair air/uirthi gan moill tar éis glaoch a fháil
They must give your case equal priority with other cases, whatever your gender, race, religion, ethnic origin, sexual orientation, age, economic circumstances or membership of any minority group

Ní mór dóibh deileáil le chuile chás leis an riachtanas céanna is cuma an fear nó bean an t-íobartach, cén cine, creideamh, bunús eitneach lena bhaineann sé/sí, cén claonadh gnéasach, aois, cúinsí eacnamúla nó ballraíocht in aon mhionghrúpa atá ag an duine
If you are a victim of crime, you are entitled to information from the Gardai
Tá sé de cheart ag íobartach coire eolas a fháil ó na Gardaí
The Gardai must tell you the name, telephone number and station of the investigating Garda
Ní mór do na Gardaí ainm, uimhir ghutháin agus stáisiún an Gharda atá ag fiosrú a c(h)áis a insint don íobartach
The Gardai will explain the investigation process to you and make sure that you are kept informed about the progress of the investigation, including whether a suspect is charged or cautioned

Ní mór do na Gardaí an próiséas fiosrúcháin a mhíniú don íobartach agus cinntiú go bhfuil eolas aige/aici go leanúnach ar an bhfiosrúchán, má tá duine cúisithe nó foláireamh tugtha dó/dí maidir leis an gcoir mar shampla
You will also be told about the support services available to victims of crime
Ba cheart dóibh freisin insint don íobartach faoi na seirbhísí tacaíochta don íobartach Victim Support
If a suspect has been charged, the Gardai will
Má tá duine cúisithe leis an gcoir ní mór do na Gardaí
• tell you whether the accused is in custody or on bail and the conditions attached to the bail
• insint don íobartach an bhfuil an té atá cúisithe faoi choiméad nó saor ar bhannaí agus céard iad na coinníollacha a bhaineann leis na bannaí sin
• tell you the time, date and location of the court hearings
• am, dáta agus áit na héisteachta sa chúirt a insint don íobartach
• explain the prosecution process involved
• cur síos ar an gcóras le duine a chiontú thabhairt don íobartach
• tell you if you are likely to be called as a witness
• insint don íobartach an bhfuil cosúlacht ann go nglaofar air/uirthi mar fhinné
• if you are going to be called as a witness, tell you about the help available from Victim Support
• insint don íobartach an bhfuil seans go nglaofar air/uirthi mar fhinné agus é/í a chur ar an eolas maidir leis an gcúnamh atá ar fáil ó Thacaíocht don Íobartach Victim Support
• explain when a judge may ask for a victim impact statement (pdf) (for sexual and violent offences) and arrange for its completion
• míniú céard atá i gceist nuair a lorgaíonn breitheamh tuairisc ar thionchar ar an íobartach (pdf) (i gcás coireanna gnéis agus foréigneacha)
• tell you if you are entitled to court expenses
• insint don íobartach má tá sé/sí i dteideal costas a éileamh le freastal ar an gcúirt
• tell you the final outcome of the trial
• toradh deireanach na trialach a chur in iúl don íobartach
If the crime caused serious trauma to you or your family, the Gardai will tell you if the offender is about to be released from prison, if they are notified of the release
Má chuir an choir isteach go mór ar an íobartach agus ar a t(h)eaghlach, inseoidh na Gardaí don íobartach é má bhíonn an ciontóir le scaoileadh ón bpríosún
There is no requirement to inform the Gardaí of the release of offenders unless a sex offenders order is in operation
Cuirfidh na Gardaí aon socruithe a theastaíonn i bhfeidhm freisin maidir le sábháilteacht an íobartaigh a chinntiú
The Gardai will show special sensitivity if you are a victim of a sexual offence
Ní mór do na Gardaí deileáil ar bhealach lochailleach faoi leith le duine a bhíonn thíos le coir ghnéis
If it is appropriate, your case will be dealt with by a special Garda unit for domestic violence and sexual assault investigation
Más gá breathnóidh aonad speisialta den Gharda i ndiaidh an cháis más fiosrúchán maidir le foréigean tí nó ionsaí gnéis atá i gceist
The Gardai will try to make sure that the Garda and the doctor who are helping you are of the same gender
Déanfaidh na Gardaí chuile iarracht gur Garda agus dochtúir den ghnéas céanna a bheidh ag deileáil le duine a d'fhulaing coir throm den chineál seo
You will be told about special support agencies dealing with sexual offences
Cuirfear eolas ar fáil don íobartach maidir le heagrais speisialta tacaíochta a bhíonn ag plé le coireanna gnéis
Families of murder victims
Teaghlaigh daoine a dúnmharaíodh
If you are the family of a murder victim, a Garda superintendent will contact you and the relevant Victim Support Service
Déanfaigh ceannfort na nGardaí teagmháil le teaghlach duine a dúnmharaíodh agus leis an tSeirbhís Tacaíochta don Íobartach
After the initial contact, a named member of the Garda team investigating the murder will continue to keep you and Victim Support informed
Nuair atá an chéad teagmháil déanta beidh Garda amháin ainmnithe ón bhfoireann fhiosrúcháin leis an teaghlach agus Tacaíocht don Íobartach a choinneáil ar an eolas maidir leis an gcás
Victims of domestic violence
Daoine a d'fhulaing foréigean tí
If you are a victim of domestic violence, you are entitled to the same Garda support services as victims of sexual violence and serious crime
Tá íobartach foréigean tí i dteideal na seirbhísí tacaíochta céanna a fháil ó na Gardaí agus a fhaigheann daoine a d'fhulaing foréigean gnéis agus coireanna troma
A pro-arrest policy reflects Garda operational practice in protecting you and your family
Tá polasaí gabhála i bhfeidhm a léiríonn obair na nGardaí ar son an íobartaigh agus an teaghlaigh a chosaint
Victims with special needs
Íobartaigh a bhfuil riachtanais speisialta acu
If you are an elderly person and you have been the victim of a crime, the Gardai will take all possible steps to protect you and your home
Déanfaidh na Gardaí chuile iarracht le seanduine ar imríodh coir ina c(h)oinne agus a t(h)each a chosaint
If you are a visitor to Ireland or if you cannot speak fluent English, the Gardai will provide a translator and will refer you to the Tourist Victim Support service
Cuirfidh na Gardaí turasóir chun na tíre nó duine nach bhfuil Béarla líofa aige/aici i dteagmháil le seirbhís Tacaíocht don Íobartach atá ina t(h)urasóir
If you are a physically or mentally disabled person, the Gardai will try to provide for your special needs
Déanfaidh na Gardaí chuile iarracht freastal ar riachtanais íobartaigh a bhfuil míchumas fisiciúil nó intinne air/uirthi

If you are not fully satisfied with the assistance you have received from members of the Garda Siochana or if you have any enquiries or suggestions, you should contact the Garda Victim Liaison Officer or your local superintendent

Má tá duine míshásta leis an gcúnamh a fhaigheann sé/sí ó bhaill den Gharda Síochána nó má tá aon fhiosrúchán nó moltaí ag duine is féidir teagmháil a dhéanamh leis Oifigeach Teagmhála Íobartaigh an Gharda Síochána nó leis an gceannfort áitiúil
You will receive a reply within 21 days
Cuirfear freagra ar ais taobh istigh de 21 lá
Further information is available in the Garda Síochána Victims Charter (pdf). Where to apply
Cá háit a ndéanfaidh mé iarratas
